title: Do you guys remember any examples of Indian media content with references to digital technologies? (example below)
selftext:
The instances I'm looking for can range across all kinds of media like music, films, graphics from news shows, even political slogans and TV commercials.

For example, there's an old tamil song called "telephone manipol", it's lyrics loosely translated mean "Is she the latest mobile phone? Did Brahma create her like a computer (as perfect as a computer)".

What else comes to your mind? I'm putting together something very interesting about our people's digital history. Hoping to even write about it. Please help out with as many examples as possible! 

Thank you!

https://preview.redd.it/ixc4ur923jfa1.jpg?width=1520&format=pjpg&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=5b34e307b688d81b2f6471cec394c8af041601ae
comments:
These came to my mind. 

1. [Nokia ad on SMS](https://youtu.be/u7mVAVQzinM) 

2. [Nokia advertising their torch feature on  Nokia 1100](https://youtu.be/9xRC9gELdeo) 
This is more of a hardware feature but then telephone wasn't a digital technology either. 

3. [Airtel's email for Re. 1](https://youtu.be/F79WIFzfFkU) 

4. Reference to email in the lyrics - "chitthi daali thi aunga mein tere ghar mail bhi kya tha maine tere id par" from the song [Seher mein](https://youtu.be/Igo8_eK7z9g) ( Rockstar ) 

5. Song - ["Caller tune"](https://youtu.be/8HnGpDTozTk)( Humshakals) 

6. Does photocopy meet the requirement? anyway here's a [kachcha mango bite ad](https://youtu.be/h-gBhGVFdis) 

7. [Call me up... call me on my telephone](https://youtu.be/_kxVmhFatb8complete)  ( Bombay Vikings) 

8.  [Dil ka telephone](https://youtu.be/a3B2glol4IU) ( Dreamgirl) 

9. Scene from Ajnabee - [ Chal main tumhe modern technique se samjha ta hu](https://youtu.be/WCtwgrqW2kw)( watch from 9:34 ) 

10. [Bobby deol display his photoshop skill](https://youtube.com/shorts/2SZZBEwZRfQ?feature=share) ( Soldier) 
 

11. Reference to www dot com, internet and computer in the song [Dhingtara dhingtara](https://youtu.be/X0zirhsbYgI) ( Hum aapke dil me rehte hai) 

12. [Raja meets Roja on IRC ]( https://youtu.be/pRbQXV_lbX0) ( Tamil movie Kadhalar dhiman, 1999) 

- telegu [version](https://youtu.be/Hyjs3Da-cSU) 

- hindi [version](https://youtu.be/HuR4NXxmRV0) 

13. Kaho na pyaar hai [climax  scene](https://youtu.be/PwWrF3b1EJw) 



14. [Mujhe raat din bas mujhe chahte ho ](https://youtu.be/txEPjAe8Vh0) ( Sangharsh) 

15. [Main yahan tu wahan](https://youtu.be/himlbsMN4g8) ( Baghban) 

Do share once your project complete.
Hey this is superb! I'll be looking at all of these in-depth! Thank you so much! And yes of course, will share what comes of this :)
